Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.xml.IAeMutableNamespaceContext

Packages that use IAeMutableNamespaceContext
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def This package contains base classes and elements used to create BPEL model definitions. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.convert.xpath This package contains classes which are used to convert xpath expressions from one version of BPEL to another. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.writers.def This package contains the IAeBpelDefWriter interface for serializing specific AeBaseDef object subclasses and the default impls. 
org.activebpel.rt.util Utility classes for XML handling, reading JARs, I/O, and a blocking queue.  
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def Classes that represent WSDL elements (partner links, port types, properties, and the like) and that serialize and deserialize them.  
org.activebpel.rt.xml Package which contains runtime components used by Active Endpoints plugins.
